title: How Rent-to-Own Can Scam You Out of Your Money and Time
description: You’ve probably heard or seen the rent-to-own advertisements online as a potential solution to not being able to afford buying a home—but you probably haven’t heard how they have been used to trick many people into spending money, time, and effort into a home that never ended up being theirs.

title: You Need a Career Crisis Plan
description: Even if your career is going well at the moment, there’s always the possibility that might change. Layoffs happen unexpectedly, and industries can be forced to deal with systemic shifts. Someone Built a 4D Minecraft Clone
description: Video games usually come in one of two dimensions: You have your 2D side scrollers, or, more commonly, your typical 3D adventures. Rarely do you see a game that pushes beyond these dimensions, since, you know, we live in the third dimension. Why, then, does a Minecraft clone exist in 4D?

title: You Can Still Get a Refund for Your Recalled Peloton Treadmill
description:

title: The Best Ways to Darken Your Bedroom (That Aren't a Blackout Curtain)
description: I require pitch blackness and perfect silence to sleep at night—no room is ever dark enough for me, though I keep trying to find one. If you’re like me, you probably have blackout curtains and a little eye mask, but there are more ways than that to further darken a room. Here are some tips you probably don’t know yet.

title: This Tomato Tart Is a Fitting Monument to Your Last Summer Tomato
description:
Only an icy heart is unsentimental about the last summer tomato. Mine was a giant orange Brandywine that I let hang onto the vine far too long, and its destiny was a tomato tart.
